property.name: Text
property.value: You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a Weapon asset.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose another investigator at your location. Both you and that investigator draw 2 cards and gain 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When Art Student enters play: Discover 1 clue at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location (2 additional clues instead if succeed by 2 or more).

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if there is a scenario card with a 'resign' ability in play. Resign. You get the hell outta here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. η Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location. Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses: 4 charges. η, Spend one charge: Fight. This attack uses ά instead of ή. You get +2 ά and deal +1 damage for this attack. If a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed during this attack, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +2 έ while investigating if you have no clues.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your location. During the enemy phase, each enemy that moves does so along the shortest path toward the attached location, instead of to where it would normally move. Forced: While attached, at the end of the round: Discard Lure.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: -X. X is the current Agenda #. β: -1. If you fail and it is your turn, lose all remaining actions and end your turn immediately. γ: -2. Add 1 doom token to the nearest Cultist enemy. δ: -3. If you fail, choose and discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: -X. X is 1 more than the current Agenda #. β: Reveal another token. If you fail and it is your turn, lose all remaining actions and end your turn immediately.. γ: -4. Add 1 doom token to each Cultist enemy in play.δ: -3. If you fail, choose and discard a card from your hand for each point you failed by.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove the leftmost location from the game (or place it in the victory display if it has Victory X and no clues on it). Each investigator at that location is defeated. Each enemy and asset at that location is discarded.Discard all clues controlled by the investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove the leftmost location from the game (or place it in the victory display if it has Victory X and no clues on it). Each investigator at that location is defeated. Each enemy and asset at that location is discarded.Discard all clues controlled by the investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove each of the two leftmost locations from the game (or place it in the victory display if either one has Victory X and no clues on it). Each investigator at those locations is defeated. Each enemy and asset at those locations is discarded.Discard all clues controlled by the investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove each of the two leftmost locations from the game (or place it in the victory display if either one has Victory X and no clues on it). Each investigator at those locations is defeated. Each enemy and asset at those locations is discarded.Discard all clues controlled by the investigators.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator is immediately defeated and takes 1 mental trauma. (→R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If an investigator enters the Engine Car, immediately advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The investigator entering the Engine Car reads the following (out loud):You must decide (choose one):- Test ί (3) to attempt to dodge the creature. If you fail, you leap too far and barely grip the side of the train, hanging on for dear life. Although you manage to pull yourself up, the experience is terrifying. You suffer 1 mental trauma.- Test ή (3) to attempt to endure the creature's extreme heat. If you fail, the creature flies through you and the heat burns you. You suffer 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If there are no clues in the Engine Car, immediately advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total ί icons or take 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total ή icons or take 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total ά icons or take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total έ icons or take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard a card from your hand with at least 1 ΰ icon or take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sleeping Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. η: Gain 3 resources. Remember that you have "stolen a passenger's luggage." (Group limit once per game).

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dining Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you reveal Dining Car: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Grappling Horror and draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Parlor Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Parlor Car cannot be investigated. η Spend 3 resources: Discover 1 clue in the Parlor Car.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it.You cannot enter Engine Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it.You cannot enter Engine Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it. Forced - After you reveal Engine Car: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Grappling Horror and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it.You cannot enter Engine Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Engine Car is connected to the location to the left of it. Forced - After you reveal Engine Car: Draw the top 3 cards of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Helpless Passenger into play at the location to your left (or at your location if you cannot). η Parley. Take control of Helpless Passenger. Forced - If Helpless Passenger leaves play: Each investigator takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (3). If you fail, take 2 damage and you cannot move from this location this round. Damage from this effect must be assigned to your assets first, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Each investigator at your location loses 1 action. Each investigator at your location with 4 or more damage must also discard an asset he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While you are engaged with Grappling Horror, you cannot move.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - The location to your right (or your location if there is no location to your right). Emergent Monstrosity enters play exhausted.
